item.description:
Relaxed ride slow, about 18 miles, stops to enjoy the foliage etc.

This ride takes you to no less than six different reservations: Noanet Woodlands, Rocky Woods, Fork Factory Brook, Chase Woodlands, Peters Reservation, and Ridge Hill Reservation.

http://www321.pair.com/oaries/localattitude/reservationsride.htm

I have also mapped it on veloroutes

http://veloroutes.org/bikemaps/?route=90421

There is some elevation gain...I might be walking those.

Â 

We will start from the Claxton Fields parking lot. It is about a mile away from the Needham Center train station if anyone is taking public transport. Also I will be going from Cambridge, and have space on my bike carried for another bike if you want to ride in with me.
item.name: Smell the roses bike ride - Reservations ride
